https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uXlCJKI5sy8WQIFjlvFkpZssIpR.jpg “Bloodrop” is an experimental short directed by Aleksei Popogrebsky. Originally part of the Experiment 5ive omnibus, hence the black envelope with the picture inside, which had to be the common element of all 5 films. Bloodrop
